code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Nav(){const[dark,setDark]=useState(()=>localStorage.getItem('dark')==='true');const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')||'null');useEffect(()=>{document.body.dataset.theme=dark?'dark':'light';localStorage.setItem('dark',dark?'true':'false');},[dark]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{flex:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"})," | ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/add",children:"Add Book"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:12,alignItems:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setDark(d=>!d),style:{padding:'6px 8px'},children:dark?'üåô Dark':'üå§Ô∏è Light'}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"small",children:["Hi, ",user.name]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})," | ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Signup"})]})]})]});}
